sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This script will set the source version for the schema mappings if version exists</description>
        <name>Set Source Version for Schema Mapping</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var source = new GlideRecord("sn_hr_integrations_source");
source.addNotNullQuery("version");
source.addActiveQuery();
source.query();
var sourceVersion;
while(source.next()){
	sourceVersion = new GlideRecord("sn_hr_integrations_source_version");
	sourceVersion.addQuery("version", source.getValue("version"));
	sourceVersion.addQuery("source", source.getValue("sys_id"));
	sourceVersion.query();
	var activeSourceVersionId;
	if(sourceVersion.next()){
		activeSourceVersionId = sourceVersion.getValue("sys_id");
		sourceVersion.setValue("active", true);
		sourceVersion.update();
		var schMapping = new GlideRecord("sn_hr_integrations_schema_mapping");
		schMapping.addQuery("source", source.sys_id);
		schMapping.addNullQuery("source_version");
		schMapping.query();
		while(schMapping.next()){
			schMapping.setValue("source_version", sourceVersion.getValue("sys_id"));
			schMapping.update();
		}
		
		sourceVersion = new GlideRecord("sn_hr_integrations_source_version");
		sourceVersion.addQuery("source", source.getValue("sys_id"));
		sourceVersion.addEncodedQuery("sys_id!="+activeSourceVersionId);
		sourceVersion.query();
		while(sourceVersion.next()){
			sourceVersion.setValue("active", false);
			sourceVersion.update();
		}
	}
	
}



]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-09-05 07:53:14</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>bbd94e059f4103003be01050a57fcf79</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Set Source Version for Schema Mapping</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Human Resources: Integrations" source="sn_hr_integrations">aaa655c19f0322003be01050a57fcf65</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Human Resources: Integrations">aaa655c19f0322003be01050a57fcf65</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_bbd94e059f4103003be01050a57fcf79</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-09-18 18:17:02</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set Source Version for Schema Mapping
